channel.title: Devo-7 Downstairs? o_O Help plz!
channel.description:
Well, how do i get downstairs in Devolution V7?
my setup is this: _____________ GROUND FLOOR <-- _____________ ^ 1ST FLOOR | _____________ | 2ND FLOOR | _____________ | ----------------> |
Every 4th floor goes to some parallel universe, without monsters as i placed them on height 0.
this also works for negative numbers, let's say im on floor 0, i set my heigth to -1, i go to -1, and i end up flying on what normally would be 2nd floor =/.
Problem here is, i want to get in to dungeons. Whenever i use -1 (normally downstairs), i go to 2nd floor of another layer of floors.
Are the dungeons just on certain positions instead of heights or how to get downstairs else?o_O

item.title: Devo-7 Downstairs? o_O Help plz!
item.dc:creator: @swodlayer swodlayer
item.description:
@swodlayer wrote:

Well, how do i get downstairs in Devolution V7?

my setup is this:

GROUND FLOOR <–
_____________ ^
1ST FLOOR |
_____________ |
2ND FLOOR |
_____________ |
----------------> |

Every 4th floor goes to some parallel universe, without monsters as i placed them on height 0.

this also works for negative numbers, let’s say im on floor 0, i set my heigth to -1, i go to -1, and i end up flying on what normally would be 2nd floor =/.

Problem here is, i want to get in to dungeons. Whenever i use -1 (normally downstairs), i go to 2nd floor of another layer of floors.

Are the dungeons just on certain positions instead of heights or how to get downstairs else?o_O

Read full topic
